verbs.description: On Fridays [ARG0: MSNBC] [V: Live] [ARG2: with Stephanie Ruhle] , former Republican National Committee chairman Michael Steele and former Obama 2012 deputy campaign manager Stephanie Cutter compared the Trump administrations detention centers for illegal immigrant children to Nazi concentration camps .

[ARGM-TMP: On Fridays] [ARG0: MSNBC Live with Stephanie Ruhle] , [ARG0: former Republican National Committee chairman Michael Steele and former Obama 2012 deputy campaign manager Stephanie Cutter] [V: compared] [ARG1: the Trump administrations detention centers for illegal immigrant children] [ARG2: to Nazi concentration camps] .
